comments: Brunson (NYK) brings his forearm towards Thompson (DET) and marginal contact occurs as Thompson's momentum carries him away from Brunson.
Hartenstein (NYK) is in Thompson's (DET) path when contact occurs, and he absorbs the contact to his chest during the pick.
Fontecchio (DET) is firming up over his right leg and he absorbs the contact from Hart (NYK) during the pick.
Duren (DET) is already in Hart's (NYK) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.

Hartenstein (NYK) cleanly blocks Duren's (DET) shot near the rim, making direct contact to the ball. Achiuwa's (NYK) arm gets caught briefly between Hartenstein and Duren, but it has no effect on the block or shot.
Achiuwa (NYK) is already in Fontecchio's (DET) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Cunningham (DET) legally contests Hart's (NYK) jump shot attempt.
Duren (DET) holds Hartenstein's (NYK) wrist, affecting his ability to get to the rebound.
Hartenstein (NYK) is the last player to touch the ball before the ball goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to the Pistons.
Hart (NYK) cleanly deflects the ball away from Cunningham (DET) on the perimeter.
Hart (NYK) applies a resting forearm to Cunningham's (DET) side, and the contact during the drive is marginal.
Grimes (DET) receives the pass on the perimeter, and the ball does not touch the sideline as he comes in contact with the ball.
Grimes (DET) maintains a legal off-arm against Achiuwa (NYK) during his shot attempt.
DiVincenzo (NYK) is already in Thompson's (DET) path when contact occurs and he does not deliver contact.
Duren (DET) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Hartenstein (NYK) cleanly deflects the ball away from Duren (DET) as they pursue the rebound.
Grimes (DET) does not step out of bounds while he is in possession of the ball.
Hart (NYK) makes contact with the ball, and with the part of Fontecchio's (DET) hand that is on the ball, as he defends the pass attempt.
Thompson (DET) brushes Hartenstein's (NYK) arm without affecting his ability to control the ball.
Thompson (DET) deflects the ball from NYK, which ends their team control. However, he does not yet gain possession before DiVincenzo (NYK) drives into his lower body. A loose ball foul was warranted.
Duren (DET) jumps from point A to point B and initiates contact with Hart (NYK) as he defends the shot near the rim.
Hartenstein (NYK) cleanly deflects the ball away from Duren (DET) as they pursue the rebound.
Thompson (DET) commits a take foul on Hart (NYK).
Achiuwa (NYK) cleanly deflects the ball away from Fontecchio (DET) as they pursue the rebound.
